data.text: @The1stGentleman If race is superficial and a social construct and our biology is the same, why would black people be sterile and white people would not. Also if they want to remain the majority they would have to sterilize Hispanics not us.
@The1stGentleman U been talkin to my grandma?
@The1stGentleman I'm pretty sure white people have actually already done that :|
@The1stGentleman See, this is where my mind goes sometimes, too! But then I remember our genetics.
